title: Drift
description: When young demon, Leo Cutler, commits treason against Hell for saving a life he was supposed to help end, punishment for his betrayal is on the menu...Sure to be served cold by his overlord Christian, it's not for fear of retaliation that makes Leo renounce Hell.It is because he has fallen in love with the near-victim, a human, Shade Lewis.Winning his freedom will not be easy, especially when the test involves going through Shade's murderous ex-boyfriend Darryl Kite, who has now, somehow, become a demon as well.With Shade's love compelling Leo forward, will he discover he has the courage to give up an eternal life? Facing the many obstacles that Christian will surely have waiting for him?Or will it all prove to be too much forcing him back into the confines of Hell?
author: Michael  Dean
